entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test JITLoad_CustomALC failed: TestLibrary.AssertTestException: Assert.IsTrue: Bind event count for AssemblyToLoad #57786
    arch-arm64, os-windows, arch-x64, area-crossgen2-coreclr, untriaged
  • LTTNG-UST 2.13 changes soname breaking loading of libcoreclrtraceptprovider #57784
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, untriaged
  • QUIC: Revisit QuicStream.ReadsComplete API #57780
    untriaged, area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • HTTP3: Loopback server should dispose underlying QUIC connection #57779
    area-System.Net.Http, test bug, untriaged, 7.0.0
  • Proposal: Avoid closures that capture a single reference-type variable per function #57778
    untriaged
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'm_compGenTreeID == m_compiler->compGenTreeID' #57775
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, in pr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'false' in src/coreclr/jit/earlyprop.cpp Line: 199 #57774
    os-linux, JitStress, arch-x64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Path to .NET 6 #57770
    area-Meta, Discussion, zbb-exception, 6.0.0
  • FileSystemAclExtensions.Create broken in multiple ways #57768
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'offset != BAD_STK_OFFS' #57767
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_VariableLiveRanges->back().m_EndEmitLocation.Valid()' #57752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Tests FailFast #57751
    area-System.Threading, disabled-test, Future
  • Enum.ToString is slower than explicit implementation #57748
    tenet-performance, untriaged
  • [Perf] WASM SoD - 6% regression in dotnet.wasm.br file #57749
    arch-wasm, tenet-performance, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.0
  • [WinHttpHandler] System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler.Functional.Tests crashing with assertion failed #57737
    area-System.Net.Http, test-run-core, Future
  • DateTime private constants #57736
    untriaged
  • Some MethodInfo(s) of array types loaded by MetadataLoadContext are incorrectly evaluated as equal. #57728
    bug, area-System.Reflection, needs further triage, Future
  • Blazor WASM CurrentInfo DateTimeFormat GetMonthName doesn't return the correct result .NET 5 #57723
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, Future
  • Assertion failed: OpenSsl error queue is not empty #57722
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, test-run-core, 7.0.0
  • Remove dotnet6 feeds when dependencies publish into dotnet7 feeds. #57716
    blocking-release, area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Usage of GetReferencedAssemblies does not return assemblies not used/loaded #57714
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, customer assistance, Future
  • Does setting a COMPlus_ environment variable after the application has already started take effect? #57713
    question, area-System.Threading, Future
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 6 RC 1, validation-runtime-.NET 6 RC 1 #runtime-102558-.NET6RC1 #57711
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main runtime, .NET 7, validation-runtime-.NET 7 #runtime-102478-.NET7 #57710
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collecting database events from a .NET 6 application causes it to crash #57709
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 6.0.0
  • System.componentModel.Annotation version 4.4.0 fails to build locally #57708
    Discussion, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove PlainPointer/RelativePointer/RelativeFixupPointer #57706
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr, in pr, 7.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Make DependencyModel.Dependency readonly and implement IEquatable<> #56082
    api-approved, area-DependencyModel, Future
  • Remove code guarded by CROSSGEN_COMPILE #57657
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [tvOS] System.Runtime.Tests fails on iOS and tvOS #52072

  • Path to .NET 6.0 for this repo #54569

    area-Extensions-FileSystem, 6.0.0
  • Unable to update runtime ids using runtimeGroups.props #57702
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove code guarded by FEATURE_PREJIT #57660
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ConstructorTests_Stream.PathForChildDictionaryFails #39055
    bug, area-System.Text.Json, blocking-release, 6.0.0
  • HttpClient should allow schemes to be restricted (for AllowAutoRedirect) #57644
    area-System.Net.Http, untriaged, 7.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets:4.3.0 Unable to resolve CVE-2019-1301 Vulnerability #57632
    area-System.Net, untriaged, 7.0.0
  • Assertion: Http2Connection.TryReserveStream - As currently used, we don't expect to call this after disposing and we don't handle the ODE #57724
    area-System.Net.Http, test-run-core, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Crash in common_call_trampoline due to inconsistent rgctx mode #57664
    untriaged, area-VM-meta-mono

    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Impossible signature padding conditions in RSAAndroid #57683
    area-System.Security, os-android, 6.0.0
  • Docs for binder tracing #41282
    documentation, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, Future
  • LLVM AOT doesn't work on MacCatalyst #57589
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-maccatalyst, 6.0.0

    area-Interop-coreclr, Future

    os-linux, os-mac-os-x, JitStress, arch-x64, area-crossgen2-coreclr, untriaged
